name: OOAK Of The Month... 3 Month SAMPLE
description:
THIS IS ONLY A 3 MONTH SAMPLE OPTION to the regular OOAK Of The Month.....

Why am I doing this???? At such a HUGE discount.... Well.... I am a SAHM that just sews to keep the right side of my brain happy. I do not depend on this as my income....it is just a hobby I LOOOOVE to do. Doing made to order items (the same items a gazillion times) takes all the fun out of it for me. I can not do it!!! This is a way to give you a HUGE discount and keep my creativity going.

All Items will be the value of $50.00- $90.00

Price includes shipping... thats over 60.00 just in shipping :)

THIS IS LESS THEN $32.00 per item including shipping..... 

Each month you will receive an OOAK BeetleBritches item and it will arrive in the mail around the end of each month. Items could be but not limited to dresses, pants, tunics, coats, bags etc. If you prefer only clothing just mention so in notes to seller :)

 Dresses will be season appropriate however short sleeve and knot style dresses will be sent throughout the year and will need to be layered. 


Sizing can be changed anytime during the year just please give me few weeks notice

ALL items are OOAK.... IF there is a particular color you can not tolerate PLEASE add to notes... I would hate to make your items purple based when you absolutly dislike the color....

I may Convo you questions throughout the year...if they are not answered I will use my best judgement ....


XOXO

name: Spunky Garden Knot Dress
description:
Custom Listing for Spunky Garden Knot Dress

Colors and design will be determind through messages :)

Sizes 1-12 available

***** 4-5 week turnaround.

name: Custom ScrappySack Backpack
description:
Custom Spot for a OOAK Scrappysack Backpack

10"x14"x5"

Please leave comments on any colors/ design/ personalization you are wanting

Bag will be shipped by Dec. 1st
